name: RedShift (itch) (jademinear)
description:
RedShift

Launch off and explore the depths of outer space! 

You are tasked with navigating the Cosmos-7 through an alien infested galaxy. Watch out for the asteroids they throw at you. The Cosmos-7 is equipped with a matter capture emitter, capable of catching  asteroids and throwing them back at enemies. Make sure to point the open end of the ship at incoming asteroids, and aim the forward end of the ship at enemies when the asteroid ejection triggers! The Cosmos-7 is also capable of several upgrades which change the way asteroids are ejected. Our experts on Earth say that there is a dangerously massive monster floating deep in space known as the "Big Mouth". How far will you make it in this vast, beautiful galaxy?

Controls

WASD - To accelerate the Cosmos-7

Mouse - Aim the Cosmos-7

Credits

Artists:

Brad Taylor (@BitRadical)

Hannah Matson

Programmer:

Jade Minear (minearjade@gmail.com)

Music:

Kevin Macleod (Special Spotlight)

Tools

Audacity
